game.title: Courageous Quest: Defeat the Dragon
game.objective: Coverge the dragon's scale and retrieve the ancient artifact to save the kingdom
game.description: A formidable dragon has been posing a threat to our land. You, the brave hero, must confront it and bring peace back. Your journey begins here.
game.reward: Excalibur, the legendary sword, and a hoard of treasure

task.description: Prove your worth by acquiring the dragon's scale. It will be a crucial step in defeating it.
The artifact is concealed deep within the lair. Seek it out and return with its ancient wisdom.
